text: My experience at Hungry Howie's was good as usual. I always get the combination sub. It is amazing. It's always hot and fresh. The convenience of having it delivered is a plus, However, I can always go and pick it up. It's not too far from …More

text: place deserves -5 stars. Don't order your pizza here unless you want it made incorrectly! ALSO- when you call for them to fix your incorrect pizza expect to drive your pizza all the way back (same night) for a remake or only get 20% off your next order. HORRIBLE customer service.
